definition: wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn

sentences.english: An automatic dividing punch mould for wheel crane spoke is described.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种轮式起重机轮辐自动分度冲孔模。

sentences.english: Let go of the spokes. Live in the center. That is the real.
sentences.chinese: 不去理会轮辐，安住在中心，那才是真实的。

sentences.english: A spoke on his bicycle was lost, so he had to buy another one and fix it .
sentences.chinese: 他自行车车轮上的轮辐丢了，得再买一个装上去。

sentences.english: The invention is suitable for manufacturing the spoke plate of the wheel type construction machinery vehicle.
sentences.chinese: 本发明适用于制造轮式工程机械车轮辐板。

sentences.english: The criminal would be attached to a cart wheel and his arms and legs stretched out along the spokes.
sentences.chinese: 犯人被绑在车轮上，手脚顺着轮辐伸直。

sentences.english: With horizontal trimming die, horizontal trimming pro- cess can be fulfilled.
sentences.chinese: 使用水平切边模具，可以完成轮辐的水平切边加工。

sentences.english: Two new spokes and a hub must be made.
sentences.chinese: 我必须重新做两根轮辐和一个轮毂。

sentences.english: And your legs are in the spokes.
sentences.chinese: 而你的腿在车的轮辐里。

sentences.english: Metallic accents on the door panels and steering wheel spokes are another link to the exterior design.
sentences.chinese: 车门面板和方向盘轮辐的金属色与其它外饰相映成辉。

definition: empennage (of an aircraft)/fletching (of an arrow)/fins (of a missile, rocket etc)/rear spoiler (of a car)
